info.name: Flatty - Google's Login Screen - (Flat Ui Colors)
info.description: Flatty brings the flavour of the trendy Flat Ui Colors to your Google's Login Screen. Google has changed the way users login to its services by serving a cleaner universal login screen. Google's most recent enhancements to its login mechanism has made it even better, however, I believe it has a lot room for improvements, so I decided to make it even cleaner and work with base colors from the flat ui palette to give it a fresh and fun look. Now you can set your own colors and choose your logo instead of Google's \o/ Please take a look at the Changelog for tips and instructions. I hope you like it. Enjoy! Get Flat UI Color Samples Here
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

Version: 1.4

 >> Stable Release: - Added subtle animation to the the sign-in box and the user's profile image on hover - Added option so that users can choose their own colors and define a logo instead of google's. Hint: If you choose to change Google's logo, please consider uploading your own logo to a cloud service such as dropbox which can serve your files through a ssl (https) secure connection. This will prevent you from getting browser security risk messages. Also, consider uploading a version of your logo with transparent background so that it has a proper contrast being over the colors you might choose. Here's a sample logo so that you can start with...the logo is white color with transparent background (png file): Download Sample Logo For now that's all, have fun!
